👑 Pawn Party: Blindfold Chess with a Twist!

🚀 Take your chess training to the next level with Pawn Party, a unique browser extension for Lichess that puts a spin on traditional blindfold chess.

🎯 Choose Your Challenge: Select which pieces to hide during your game - pawns, knights, bishops, or rooks. Customize your training to match your skill level and preferences.

⏱️ Customizable Delays: Set when pieces are hidden in your game. Add an extra layer of challenge and adapt to different scenarios.

🕹️ Gameplay with Hidden Pieces: Even when pieces are hidden, interact with them and locate them through chess notation. Keep the tangible gameplay while boosting your visualization and analytical skills.

Perfect for Chess Coaches: Enhance your students' mental agility and visualization skills. Prepare them for any chess challenge that comes their way with Pawn Party.

💡 Why Pawn Party? By practicing chess without specific pieces, boost your visualization and calculation skills – key assets in chess. Anticipate moves, visualize different positions, and make your training more dynamic and engaging.

Start now and transform your chess training!
